title: Can we put decorations in the house on Eid & buy a cake? #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: have minha from Canada I just want to ask that can we put decoration in Eden by a cake can we put decoration in the house on on the occasion of or and buy a cake the answer is yes you can and you can also buy candies and buy gifts and ask your parents to buy you gifts all of this is permissible inshallah and Allah Knows Best
